BIO

I'm a full stack web developer skilled in Laravel and Vue JS.

My goal is to enhance my technical skills, professional skills, capabilities and knowledge in an organization which recognizes the value of hard work and trusts me with responsibilities and challenges.

P.S: I'm also a Pharmacist.
